problem.markdown: >>The IPCC states that it is “extremely likely” that humans are the cause for unprecedented warming since the 1950s. What are some likely effects of global warming?<< Choose the TWO characteristics that apply. [x] warming of atmosphere [x] warming of oceans [] decrease in sea level [] increases in global snow and ice [] increases in global biodiversity [explanation] The IPCC states, “Warming of the climate system is unequivocal, and since the 1950s, many of the observed changes are unprecedented over decades to millennia. The atmosphere and the ocean have warmed, the amounts of snow and ice have diminished, sea level has risen…” [explanation]
problem.p: The IPCC states that it is “extremely likely” that humans are the cause for unprecedented warming since the 1950s. What are some likely effects of global warming? Choose the TWO characteristics that apply.

checkboxgroup.label: The IPCC states that it is “extremely likely” that humans are the cause for unprecedented warming since the 1950s. What are some likely effects of global warming?
checkboxgroup.choice: increases in global snow and ice

div.p: The IPCC states, “Warming of the climate system is unequivocal, and since the 1950s, many of the observed changes are unprecedented over decades to millennia. The atmosphere and the ocean have warmed, the amounts of snow and ice have diminished, sea level has risen…”
